name: .hope
description:
When the hope is gone, you may wish to face the fears again. Once there was a little girl living in this filthy world of ours, struggling with her life as if she was meant to lose all her hopes. All the  pain she had got through led her to the mysterious universe formed in her tangled mind. The magical world entwines with the loathsome reality that Miya must face in order to bring the peace back to her life.
You are the one that has been chosen to decide of her fate. Experience the wondrous but cruel world and never miss your chance.

We are glad to present you the early release of our game.  The adventures of our little protagonist are going to be continued and the progress shall be updated soon. We have already designed 5 next levels, that will closely describe you Miya's story. Each of them takes place in a new realm that is a metaphor of her traumatic experiences from the past. 

This game was also designed to bring everyone a very important message, that will be revealed in the end of the story.

We all hope you will enjoy your gameplay and we wish to receive any constructive opinions.

Authors:

Maria Filemonowicz - story designer, graphic designer, game designer

Andrzej Olechnowicz - main programmer, level-designer, game designer

Dariusz Strzelecki - music creator, FX

Łukasz Wróblewski - programmer
